description: Golden-path PSIRT test corpus for architecture testing (Section 9)

psirts.summary: A vulnerability in the SSH server implementation of Cisco IOS XE Software could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition on an affected device.
psirts.notes: Clear SSH vulnerability, single label expected

psirts.summary: A vulnerability in the BGP processing code of Cisco IOS XE Software could allow an unauthenticated, adjacent attacker to cause a denial of service by sending malformed BGP UPDATE messages.
A vulnerability in the IOx application hosting subsystem of Cisco IOS XE Software could allow an authenticated, remote attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition on an affected device.
A vulnerability in the OSPF packet processing code of Cisco IOS XR Software could allow an unauthenticated, adjacent attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) condition.
A vulnerability in the remote access VPN feature of Cisco Adaptive Security Appliance (ASA) Software could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to cause a DoS condition.

bugs.summary: SSH connection drops when using RSA key authentication with ED25519 keys on IOS-XE devices
BGP session flaps during route refresh with large number of prefixes
bugs.notes: Terse bug description for routing issue
